author: Garrey Dawson
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Crack the eggs into a large bowl and beat well. Add the pasta and herbs, season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper and stir well. Heat the butter in a small ovenproof frying pan, pour in the egg and pasta mixture and cook for 3-4 minutes, until set and lightly browned on the bottom. Place in the oven and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until cooked through. To serve, slide onto a plate and cut into slices.
ingredients: 2 free-range eggs,  250g/9oz fresh tagliolini pasta, blanched and drained,  1 tbsp each finely chopped fresh parsley, basil, chives, coriander and dill,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  55g/2oz butter
